name: Dungeon_Likes_Rogue
description:
GameJam Topic: "Roguelike Dungeon" c:

How to play:

-drag and drop the hero to adjacent tiles

-kill enemies with items or make them kill themselves!

-have fun and explore the dungeon

Features:

-wizards (will teleport between 2 points)
-skeletons (will move from wall to wall)
-orcs (will follow you)
-potions (invisibility - orcs stop following you | teleport - teleports to the stairs room)
-weapons (sword - swing to kill monsters | bow - shoot an arrow)
-chests (random loot)
